prover.gui.jobs
Interface IAppendJob

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppendJob, ColorAppendJob, SimpleAppendJob
public interface IAppendJob

Jobs to append some text to viewers. To schedule this Job the prepare() method shall be used instead of the usual Job.

Method Summary
 void add(String str)
          Add the specified string to be append to the target document.
 void add(StringBuffer str)
          Add the specified StringBuffer to be append to the target document.
 int getLength()
          Returns the length of the String to add to the document.
 void prepare()
          Prepare the string to be append and then schedule the Job.
 

Method Detail

prepare

public void prepare()
Prepare the string to be append and then schedule the Job. It is to be used instead of Job.

add

public void add(String str)
Add the specified string to be append to the target document.

Parameters:
str - The string to append

add

public void add(StringBuffer str)
Add the specified StringBuffer to be append to the target document.

Parameters:
str - The string to append

getLength

public int getLength()
Returns the length of the String to add to the document.

Returns:
the length, superior to 0.
